access: Characters from Alkenstar have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pocket Watch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1790)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Characters from Alkenstar have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This timepiece is a marvel of clockwork and miniaturization; its gears, arbor, and mainspring are immaculately crafted and tuned to maximize precision and reduce time loss. This pocket watch has the properties of a [clockwork dial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=864), except it has a maximum duration of 24 hours and is available to characters from Alkenstar.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
